question:
[Elizabeth] and her son, [Mickey], went to the park, and had a wonderful time. [Mickey] invited his sister [Sara] to dinner this Friday because it is her birthday. [Leandro] took his grandmother [Carmelita] out to lunch. [Sara] asked her mother, [Elizabeth], what they were going to have for lunch. [Elizabeth] was excited to visit her son, [Leandro], at college. [Reynaldo] is having a meal with his father [Tommy]. [Carmelita] and [Tommy] are happy with each other.
Question: How is [Reynaldo] related to [Elizabeth]?
